settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

Apply evenly on the face, neck, and other body parts in need of UV protection.


STEP 2

During prolonged sun exposure, apply every two hours.


WHEN

Daily as the last step in your morning skincare ritual, at least 30 minutes prior to sun exposure.


GOOD TO KNOW

Can be worn alone or under makeup as a primer.

settings.text:
K-beauty sunscreens are well-known for their beautiful sensory experience and fine-tuned aesthetic finishes - regulated as cosmetics in South Korea, these formulations are open to ingredient maximization.

In the US, formulation is much more strict, leaving formulators with little direction on innovation. RIMAN has created the perfect answer to this - a beautiful formulation WITH US-approved filters. With this, the Aqua Protection Sunscreen stays both true to its roots and bolstered by innovation.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
